00006 class SPRFile extends SpriteFile {
00007         
00008     public function SPRFile(IReader  $reader) {
00009         parent::SpriteFile('SPR');
00010         $frameCount = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00011         
00012         for($i=0;$i<$frameCount;$i++) {
00013             $offset = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00014             $width = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00015             $height = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00016             $this->AddFrame(new SPRFrame($reader,$width,$height,$offset));
00017         }
00018     }
00019     public function Compile() {
00020       $data = pack('v',$this->GetFrameCount());
00021       $offset = 2+(8*$this->GetFrameCount());
00022       foreach($this->GetFrames() as $frame) {
00023         $data .= pack('V',$offset);
00024         $data .= pack('vv',$frame->GetWidth(),$frame->GetHeight());
00025         $offset += $frame->GetWidth()*$frame->GetHeight();
00026       }
00027       foreach($this->GetFrames() as $frame) {
00028         $data .= $frame->Encode();
00029       }
00030       return $data;
00031     }
00032 }
